activities.summary: Evacuate Morrison immediately, middle schooler's piano recital week

activities.title: Incomplete Grade Notice - Math 1B
activities.summary: You have 90 days to complete Math 1B and submit a Petition to Remove an Incomplete

activities.title: Spring Registration Block - Unpaid CARS Bill
activities.summary: You have an unpaid CARS balance of $673. Action Required.

activities.title: November CARS bill Posted
activities.summary: Your November CARS bill of $987 is due by October 22

activities.title: Appointment Signups Updated - Office Hours
activities.summary: Student may sign up for office hours once per week

activities.title: Telebears Phase I Appointment - Oct 26 at 11am
activities.summary: Your Phase I appointment is scheduled for Oct 26 at 11am

activities.title: Incomplete Emergency Loan Application Notice
activities.summary: Your Loan Promissory Note has not been submitted with a signature

activities.title: Admission Process Incomplete (transcript received, not reviewed)
activities.summary: The Admissions Office has received, but not yet completed the review of your high school transcript.  This review must be completed and your high school graduation, or equivalent, verified before you can receive any federal aid.  Contact the Admissions Office to resolve this matter.

activities.title: Units less than half-time for fall - Cal Grant
activities.summary: Your Cal Grant cannot pay until you are enrolled at least half-time for the fall semester.

activities.title: Units less than half-time for spring - Cal Grant
activities.summary: Your Cal Grant cannot pay until you are enrolled at least half-time for the spring semester.

activities.title: Units less than half-time for fall - DL
activities.summary: Your Direct Loan will not pay until you are enrolled at least half-time for the fall semester.

activities.title: Berkeley Middle Class Access Plan (MCAP)
activities.summary: You are eligible for the Berkeley Middle Class Access Plan (MCAP).  Your Federal Parent Contribution is already lower than the MCAP limit of 15% of your total income, and your awards reflect this best option. To learn more about the Berkeley Middle Class Access Plan, please follow the link to the right.
